Articles.Content:
On Sunday, January 07, 2018 at 3:28 AM, LegendaryAce said:

Okay, so this is a bit random, but now that the release date is confirmed, am I the only one that wishes that they could use their own music in the game?

I could just imagine entering the Jool system hearing this song.

Just turn down ingame Music and hear your own List via Spotify or something else. U can Run Spotify and a game AT the Same time

On 1/6/2018 at 9:28 PM, LegendaryAce said:

Okay, so this is a bit random, but now that the release date is confirmed, am I the only one that wishes that they could use their own music in the game?

I could just imagine entering the Jool system hearing this song.

I actually enjoy the in game music and sound effects.  There's just something about getting into space and hearing that music kick in and enjoying the view.  Listening to other music just wouldn't feel the same to me.    To be honest though, I've never been one to listen to "outside" music while playing any game.
Most of the time i play ksp without any ingamesound and have yt running in the backround
I use the “USB Music” app on PS4 for listening to music. Just plug in a USB stick into the PS4 And start listening. It works great.
